name: CORNING GLASS WORKS v. John H. NORBERG

parties: CORNING GLASS WORKS v. John H. NORBERG.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The petition for writ of certiorari is denied.

attorneys: Hinckley, Allen, Salisbury & Parsons, H. Peter Olsen and Gregory L. Benik, Providence, for petitioner.
Dennis J. Roberts II, Atty. Gen., William G. Brody, Asst. Atty. Gen., Charles Edwin Goldkamp, Legal Officer (Taxation), Providence, for respondent.
casebody.head_matter:
CORNING GLASS WORKS v. John H. NORBERG.
No. 80-454-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
Nov. 26, 1980.
Hinckley, Allen, Salisbury & Parsons, H. Peter Olsen and Gregory L. Benik, Providence, for petitioner.
Dennis J. Roberts II, Atty. Gen., William G. Brody, Asst. Atty. Gen., Charles Edwin Goldkamp, Legal Officer (Taxation), Providence, for respondent.
